languages.text: On hit the wielder follows up with their shield, making the target perform Toughness (+20) test or become Stunned for 1 round

traits.locale_text: On hit the wielder follows up with their shield, making the target perform Toughness (+20) test or become Stunned for 1 round

languages.text: If the wielder has a shield equipped, whenever they {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the target with this maul, they immediately make a {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g} against that target. If it hits, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Если у персонажа в руке щит, цели, получившие попадание этой булавой, выполняют проверку Выносливости на сопротивление с бонусом +20 и в случае провала получают оглушение на 1 раунд.

traits.locale_text: If the wielder has a shield equipped, whenever they {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the target with this maul, they immediately make a {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g} against it. If it hits, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

If the wielder has a shield equipped, whenever they {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the target with this maul, they immediately make a {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g} against that target. If it hits, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

If the wielder has a shield equipped, whenever they {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the target with this maul, they immediately make a {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g} against that target. If it hits, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

If the wielder has a shield equipped, whenever they {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the target with this maul, they immediately make a {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g} against that target. If it hits, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: Kullanan kişi kalkan kuşanmışsa bu tokmakla hedefe {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğunda{/g}, aynı hedefe anında bir de {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Kalkan Çarpışı{/g} yapar. Vurursa hedef, +20 bonusa sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemler{/g}. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
languages.original_text: If the wielder has a shield equipped, whenever they {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the target with this maul, they immediately make a {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g} against that target. If it hits, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Kullanan kişi kalkan kuşanmışsa bu tokmakla hedefe {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğunda{/g}, aynı hedefe anında bir de {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Kalkan Çarpışı{/g} yapar. Vurursa hedef, +20 bonusa sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemler{/g}. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.

Kullanan kişi kalkan kuşanmışsa bu tokmağın {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğu{/g} hedefler, +20 bonusa sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemlerler{/g}. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.

languages.text: Si el portador tiene equipado un escudo, cuando {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} al objetivo con esta maza, inmediatamente lanza un {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Golpe de escudo{/g} contra el mismo objetivo. Si impacta con este golpe, el objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una bonificación de +20 o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the wielder has a shield equipped, whenever they {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the target with this maul, they immediately make a {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g} against that target. If it hits, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si el portador tiene equipado un escudo, cuando {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} al objetivo con esta maza, inmediatamente lanza un {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Golpe de escudo{/g} contra el mismo objetivo. Si impacta con este golpe, el objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una bonificación de +20 o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

Si el portador tiene equipado un escudo, cuando {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} al objetivo con esta maza, inmediatamente lanza un {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Golpe de escudo{/g} contra él. Si impacta con este golpe, el objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una bonificación de +20 o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

Si el portador tiene equipado un escudo, cuando {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} al objetivo con esta maza, inmediatamente lanza un {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Golpe de escudo{/g} contra él. Si impacta con este golpe, el objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una bonificación de +20 o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: 如果装备者同样装备了盾牌，则每当装备者使用这把大锤{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，都会立刻对该目标发动{g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}盾牌猛击{/g}。如果攻击命中，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中获得+20加值。若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: If the wielder has a shield equipped, whenever they {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the target with this maul, they immediately make a {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g} against that target. If it hits, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 如果装备者同样装备了盾牌，则每当装备者使用这把大锤{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，都会立刻对该目标发动{g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}盾牌猛击{/g}。如果攻击命中，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中获得+20加值。若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

如果装备者同样装备了盾牌，则被这把大锤{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中获得+20加值。若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: Si l'utilisateur est équipé d'un bouclier, chaque fois qu'il {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} la cible avec cette masse, il lui assène immédiatement un {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}coup de bouclier{/g}. Si la cible est touchée par ce coup, elle doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec un bonus de +20. En cas d'échec, elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the wielder has a shield equipped, whenever they {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the target with this maul, they immediately make a {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g} against that target. If it hits, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si l'utilisateur est équipé d'un bouclier, chaque fois qu'il {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} la cible avec cette masse, il lui assène immédiatement un {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}coup de bouclier{/g}. Si la cible est touchée par ce coup, elle doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec un bonus de +20. En cas d'échec, elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

Si l'utilisateur est équipé d'un bouclier, la cible {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchée{/g} par cette masse doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec un bonus de +20, sans quoi elle est {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}étourdie{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

Si l'utilisateur est équipé d'un bouclier, la cible {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchée{/g} par cette masse doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec un bonus de +20, sans quoi elle est {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}étourdie{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者がシールドを装備している場合、このモールでの攻撃がターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}した時、直ちに{g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}シールドバッシュ{/g}を行う。このシールドバッシュが命中した場合、ターゲットは+20ボーナスで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}する。
languages.original_text: If the wielder has a shield equipped, whenever they {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the target with this maul, they immediately make a {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g} against it. If it hits, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者がシールドを装備している場合、このモールでの攻撃がターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}した時、直ちに{g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}シールドバッシュ{/g}を行う。このシールドバッシュが命中した場合、ターゲットは+20ボーナスで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}する。

languages.text: Hat der Träger einen Schild ausgerüstet, löst jeder {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} mit diesem Hammer sofort einen {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Schildstoß{/g} gegen das Ziel aus. Wird das Ziel getroffen, muss es eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem Bonus von +20 bestehen, um nicht 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} zu werden.
languages.original_text: If the wielder has a shield equipped, whenever they {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the target with this maul, they immediately make a {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g} against that target. If it hits, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Hat der Träger einen Schild ausgerüstet, löst jeder {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} mit diesem Hammer sofort einen {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Schildstoß{/g} gegen das Ziel aus. Wird das Ziel getroffen, muss es eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem Bonus von +20 bestehen, um nicht 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} zu werden.

Hat der Träger einen Schild ausgerüstet, muss das von diesem Hammer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffene{/g} Ziel eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem Bonus von +20 bestehen, um nicht 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} zu werden.

Hat der Träger einen Schild ausgerüstet, muss das von diesem Hammer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffene{/g} Ziel eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem Bonus von +20 bestehen, um nicht 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} zu werden.

languages.text: Если у персонажа в руке щит, при {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадании{/g} по цели этой булавой персонаж сразу же совершает по ней {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Удар щитом{/g}. При его попадании цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} с бонусом +20 и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушена{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

If it hits, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
